participant_1.background:
I enjoy quiet activities in my free time, like reading, writing, and spending time in nature.
I listen to Bruno Mars' music and reminisce about the good times I had playing sports with my family and friends when I was younger.
I miss the weather in my old hometown, but I'm starting to appreciate the change of seasons here.
i like playing badminton.
My relationship with my boss is still in its early stages.

participant_2.background:
I spend my free time tinkering with new cellphone app ideas.
i enjoy listening to country music.
I am frugal and creative with my wardrobe.
i work as an interior designer.
I enjoy my tea while I am working on my goals, and it helps me stay focused and productive.

content.text: Hi there! I'm a bit bored, how are you doing?
Hi there! I'm doing great, thanks for asking!
What do you like to do for fun?

I love to tinker with new ideas for cellphone apps. It's so much fun to come up with something that I think will be useful or helpful for people. And then, it's even better when I can actually create it and put it out there for people to use!
That sounds really cool! I'm not very good with technology, but I can appreciate the creativity that goes into making something like that.
Thanks! It's definitely not easy, but it's a lot of fun.
What kind of music do you like?
I like all kinds of music, but I really love country music. There's just something about it that puts me in a good mood.
I like country music too! I grew up listening to it with my parents.
That's awesome! It's one of the few things that can bring me back to my childhood.
Me too! What's your favorite country song?
That's a tough question! I have so many favorites. But I think I'd have to say "The Dance" by Garth Brooks. It's just such a beautiful song.
That's a great song! I love it too.
Me too! What do you do for work?
I work as an interior designer. I love it! I get to help people create beautiful spaces that they love.
That sounds amazing! I'm sure you're very good at it.
Thank you! I try my best!
Do you have a favorite project that you've worked on?
I do! I recently worked on a project for a client who wanted to create a modern, minimalist space. It was a lot of fun to work on, and I think it turned out great.
That sounds really cool! I'm sure it did turn out great.
Thanks! I'm glad you think so
